name: Wolfe
description:
Shoot wolves and protect your sheep.

Wolfe is an arcade style shooter with clean graphics, a simple concept, and controls that are easily mastered. Can be played with either an azerty or qwerty keyboard.

Wolfe was made in 2 days as a personal challenge. I may or may not add aditional features. Any bugs found can be reported in the comments or to my email at noahvan35@gmail.com.

Happy hunting!
